Comments_Questions: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I further learned how to plan and execute experiments. I gained valuable insight to both being a PI and being a phD candidate in an engineering lab.  I learned laboratory techniques including metal deposition, spin coating, and spray coating.

Strengths of this course include flexibility of scheduling and 1:1 experience with a post-doc/phD student. Weaknesses include lack of substantial time every week, leading to slow progress in experiments.

I would definitely recommend this course to any student looking to gain perspective and experience on laboratory work.  This course is an excellent window into life in grad school, and will teach the student important basic and complex laboratory techniques.
